languages.text: "Я... все больше начинаю сомневаться в этом. Пусть и понимаю, отчего собратья так поступили. Отчего приняли на себя роль клинка возмездия... Ты и сам{mf||а} знаешь, на что способно черное сердце и извращенный разум гемункула. Его нужно остановить!" {n}Точеное лицо эльдарки обрамляется тоской и сомнениями.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я... все больше начинаю сомневаться в этом. Пусть и понимаю, отчего собратья так поступили. Отчего приняли на себя роль клинка возмездия... Ты и сам{mf||а} знаешь, на что способно черное сердце и извращенный разум гемункула. Его нужно остановить!" {n}Точеное лицо эльдарки обрамляется тоской и сомнениями.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I... am growing increasingly doubtful. Although I understand why my kin have acted this way. Why they took on the role of vengeful blade... You know well what the dark heart and perverted mind of the Haemonculus are capable of. He must be stopped!" {n}Yrliet's sharply angled features are softened by sadness and uncertainty.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я... все больше начинаю сомневаться в этом. Пусть и понимаю, отчего собратья так поступили. Отчего приняли на себя роль клинка возмездия... Ты и сам{mf||а} знаешь, на что способно черное сердце и извращенный разум гемункула. Его нужно остановить!" {n}Точеное лицо эльдарки обрамляется тоской и сомнениями.{/n}

You know well what his dark hart and perverted mind of the haemonculus are capable of. He must be stopped!" {n}Yrliet's chiselled features are smoothed by sadness and uncertainty.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

You know well what the dark heart and perverted mind of the Haemonculus are capable of. He must be stopped!" {n}Yrliet's sharply angled features are softened by sadness and uncertainty.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... am growing increasingly doubtful. Although I understand why my kin have acted this way. Why they took on the role of vengeful blade... You know well what the dark heart and perverted mind of the Haemonculus are capable of. He must be stopped!" {n}Yrliet's sharply angled features are softened by sadness and uncertainty.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Yo... cada vez albergo más dudas. Aunque entiendo por qué han actuado de este modo. Por qué han asumido el papel de la espada vengadora... Sabes bien de qué son capaces el oscuro corazón y la mente perversa del hemónculo. ¡Es preciso detenerlo!». {n}Las facciones afiladas de Yrliet se relajan con una expresión de tristeza e incertidumbre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... am growing increasingly doubtful. Although I understand why my kin have acted this way. Why they took on the role of vengeful blade... You know well what the dark heart and perverted mind of the Haemonculus are capable of. He must be stopped!" {n}Yrliet's sharply angled features are softened by sadness and uncertainty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Yo... cada vez albergo más dudas. Aunque entiendo por qué han actuado de este modo. Por qué han asumido el papel de la espada vengadora... Sabes bien de qué son capaces el oscuro corazón y la mente perversa del hemónculo. ¡Es preciso detenerlo!». {n}Las facciones cinceladas de Yrliet se relajan con una expresión de tristeza e incertidumbre.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我……我越来越怀疑了。虽然我能理解为什么我的族人会这么做，理解他们为什么打算承担复仇之刃的角色……你很清楚，血伶人阴暗的内心与邪恶的思想能做出多么可怕的事情，我们必须阻止他！”{n}伊莉耶特棱角分明的面孔，此刻笼罩在怀疑与悲伤之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... am growing increasingly doubtful. Although I understand why my kin have acted this way. Why they took on the role of vengeful blade... You know well what the dark heart and perverted mind of the Haemonculus are capable of. He must be stopped!" {n}Yrliet's sharply angled features are softened by sadness and uncertainty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我……我越来越怀疑了。虽然我能理解为什么我的族人会这么做，理解他们为什么打算承担复仇之刃的角色……你很清楚，血伶人阴暗的内心与邪恶的思想能做出多么可怕的事情，我们必须阻止他！”{n}伊莉耶特棱角分明的面孔，此刻笼罩在怀疑与悲伤之中。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'en doute de plus en plus... même si je comprends pourquoi ils ont agi ainsi, en assumant le rôle de lame vengeresse... Vous savez aussi bien que moi de quoi le cœur noir et l'esprit pervers de l'hémoncule sont capables. Il faut l'arrêter ! » {n}La tristesse et l'incertitude adoucissent les traits burinés d'Yrliet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... am growing increasingly doubtful. Although I understand why my kin have acted this way. Why they took on the role of vengeful blade... You know well what the dark heart and perverted mind of the Haemonculus are capable of. He must be stopped!" {n}Yrliet's sharply angled features are softened by sadness and uncertainty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'en doute de plus en plus... même si je comprends pourquoi ils ont agi ainsi, en assumant le rôle de lame vengeresse... Vous savez aussi bien que moi de quoi le cœur noir et l'esprit pervers de l'hémoncule sont capables. Il faut l'arrêter ! » {n}La tristesse et l'incertitude adoucissent les traits burinés d'Yrliet.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我は…ますます疑念を深めているんだ。我が血族がなぜこのような行動をとったのかは理解できる。なぜ復讐の刃の役割を引き受けたのか…あなたは、ハモンキュラスの暗き心と倒錯した精神が何をしでかすか、よく知っているはずだ。彼は止めなければならない！」{n}ユリエットのシャープな顔立ちは、悲しみと不安によって和らいでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... am growing increasingly doubtful. Although I understand why my kin have acted this way. Why they took on the role of vengeful blade... You know well what the dark heart and perverted mind of the Haemonculus are capable of. He must be stopped!" {n}Yrliet's sharply angled features are softened by sadness and uncertainty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我は…ますます疑念を深めているんだ。我が血族がなぜこのような行動をとったのかは理解できる。なぜ復讐の刃の役割を引き受けたのか…あなたは、ハモンキュラスの暗き心と倒錯した精神が何をしでかすか、よく知っているはずだ。彼は止めなければならない！」{n}ユリエットのシャープな顔立ちは、悲しみと不安によって和らいでいる。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... bekomme zunehmend Zweifel. Wobei ich verstehe, warum meine Verwandten so gehandelt haben. Warum sie die Rolle der rachsüchtigen Klinge übernommen haben ... Ihr wisst genau, wozu das dunkle Herz und der pervertierte Verstand des Haemonculus fähig sind. Man muss ihn aufhalten!" {n}Yrliets kantige Züge werden durch Trauer und Unsicherheit geglättet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... am growing increasingly doubtful. Although I understand why my kin have acted this way. Why they took on the role of vengeful blade... You know well what the dark heart and perverted mind of the Haemonculus are capable of. He must be stopped!" {n}Yrliet's sharply angled features are softened by sadness and uncertainty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... bekomme zunehmend Zweifel. Wobei ich verstehe, warum meine Verwandten so gehandelt haben. Warum sie die Rolle der rachsüchtigen Klinge übernommen haben ... Ihr wisst genau, wozu das dunkle Herz und der pervertierte Verstand des Haemonculus fähig sind. Man muss ihn aufhalten!" {n}Yrliets kantige Züge werden durch Trauer und Unsicherheit geglättet.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Benim... Kuşkum gittikçe artıyor. Her ne kadar soydaşlarımın neden böyle davrandıklarını, neden intikam kılıcı rolünü üstlendiklerini anlasam da... Onun karanlık kalbinin ve sapkın zihninin neler yapabileceğini çok iyi biliyorsun. Onu durdurmamız gerek!" {n}Yrliet'in keskin yüz hatları, keder ve kararsızlıkla yumuşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... am growing increasingly doubtful. Although I understand why my kin have acted this way. Why they took on the role of vengeful blade... You know well what the dark heart and perverted mind of the Haemonculus are capable of. He must be stopped!" {n}Yrliet's sharply angled features are softened by sadness and uncertainty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Benim... Kuşkum gittikçe artıyor. Her ne kadar soydaşlarımın neden böyle davrandıklarını, neden intikam kılıcı rolünü üstlendiklerini anlasam da... Onun karanlık kalbinin ve sapkın zihninin neler yapabileceğini çok iyi biliyorsun. Onu durdurmamız gerek!" {n}Yrliet'in keskin yüz hatları, keder ve kararsızlıkla yumuşuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
